And <S%G2532><s%> in the <S%G4404>morning,<s%> It will be foul <S%G5494>weather<s%> today: <S%G4594><s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3772>sky<s%> is <S%G4449>red<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4768>lowering.<s%> O ye <S%G5273>hypocrites,<s%> ye <S%G1097>can<s%> <S%G1252>discern<s%> the <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3303><s%> face <S%G4383><s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3772>sky;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> ye <S%G3756>not<s%> discern <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> times? <S%G2540><s%>

A <S%G4190>wicked<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3428>adulterous<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%> seeketh <S%G1934>after<s%> a <S%G4592>sign;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> there shall <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4592>sign<s%> be <S%G1325>given<s%> unto <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G1508>but<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4592>sign<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4396>prophet<s%> Jonah. <S%G2495><s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2641>left<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> and <S%G565>departed.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> were <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> other <S%G4008>side,<s%> they had <S%G1950>forgotten<s%> to <S%G2983>take<s%> <S%G740>bread.<s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Take <S%G3708>heed<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4337>beware<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2219>leaven<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the Sadducees. <S%G4523><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G4920>understood<s%> they <S%G3754>how<s%> that he <S%G2036>bade<s%> them <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4337>beware<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2219>leaven<s%> of <S%G740>bread,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1322>doctrine<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G4523>Sadducees.<s%>
